channel.title: Does Whonix local browser welcome page affect the fingerprint of Tor Browser?
channel.description: Hi, I was wondering if replacing the start page file (file:///usr/share/doc/homepage/whonix-welcome-page/whonix.html) in the whonix-ws-16 template, has the torbrowser fingerprint affected? Considering I wrote the page myself and it's definitely not knocking on any servers.

item.title: Does Whonix local browser welcome page affect the fingerprint of Tor Browser?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Joowov:

has the torbrowser fingerprint affected?

I don’t think that’s likely. It’s just a html file on the hard drive.

My soon upcoming answer in Apparmor tor browser fingerprint will also be somewhat related.

Joowov:

and it’s definitely not knocking on any servers.

Yes, that’s very much by design.

Joowov:

Considering I wrote the page myself

What do you mean?

Read full topic
item.source: Does Whonix local browser welcome page affect the fingerprint of Tor Browser?
